Como o meu percurso profissional inclui: As my professional career includes the job market, whether training or outside Portugal, I had the opportunity to collaborate, contact and interact with the most varied nationalities and languages.
As autoavaliações são sempre tendenciosa: Self-assessments are always biased, but as these interactions have gone well, even the ones that have gone wrong, I would say I have above-average skills.
Tenho por dado adquirido que ambientes d: I take it for granted that clean and organized work environments produce a more productive environment, thus becoming a win-win situation. The employee wins and the organization wins.
Sou o tipo de pessoa que pega, usa e vol: I'm the type of person who picks it up, uses it and puts it back in the same place, if by chance it gets dirty... I'll clean it.
Então eu diria que sim, tenho competênci: So I would say yes, I have organizational skills and I maintain them over time.
